conversation_obj.conversation:
- User: When's my next meeting with Conphy Wang
   - Bing: Your next meeting with Conphy Wang is the "OLM Datasets Scrum" organized by Shengqiu Li, which is scheduled to start at 2 PM and end at 2:30 PM. The other attendees include Yihao Lin, Yang Bai, Kobe Qin, Siyao Jiang, Lang Zhou, Xin Zhao, Yi Ding, and Peiyu Zhang. [^1^]
   - User: Summarize email from Shengqiu
   - Bing: Here is a summary of recent emails from Shengqiu Li:
- On the 7th of April, Shengqiu thanked Heng Pian for extending the retention of RankLog streams on Cosmos. [^10^]
- On April 20th, Shengqiu asked Ying Sun and Renbo Deng to review a PR to add a new BizChat dataset type to the MDP SDK. [^9^]
- On April 28th, Shengqiu forwarded an announcement about the availability of FVL MDP data to a broader audience. [^8^]
- On the 1st of June, Shengqiu explained the meaning of ConversationId in the SigsOIVIC offline dataset to Yu Gu, Yihao Lin, and Conphy Wang. [^7^]
- On the 7th of June, Shengqiu updated Conphy Wang, Milad Shokouhi, Qing Yu, Richard Zhao, and Debashish Saha on the status of BizChat Feedback data pipelines. [^5^]
- On the 9th of June, Shengqiu initiated a conversation with Michael Stokes, Denise La Rue, and the SIP CSPR team about a review of data movement for LLM-based evaluation metrics. [^4^]
- On the 11th of June, Shengqiu thanked Michael Stokes, Daniela Mauler, Abram Jackson, Denise La Rue, and Jorge Carrillo Ugalde for their guidance and asked Jorge if they could chat on Monday. [^3^]
- On the afternoon of last Tuesday, Shengqiu informed Conphy Wang that they had gone through a privacy review with Jorge and got approval to move BizChat evaluation metrics out of the compliance boundary. [^2^]
- On the afternoon of last Wednesday, Shengqiu sent a detailed list of metrics they would like to show in the eyes-on dashboard to Jim Edelen, Michael Stokes, Conphy Wang, Sahil Aggarwal, Ken Ewert, Thomas Brackin, Denise La Rue, Farah Ali, Jorge Carrillo Ugalde, and LaMont Walker, and asked Jorge to review them. [^1^]

query: When's my next meeting with Conphy Wang
